div.div:
liam - June 9, 2012 - Xperia X10 Mini Pro with version 1.2.1
After this wallpaper i've never changed again.

Adnan - June 11, 2012 - SEMC Xperia X10 with version 1.2.1
Backround
If only there r more colors and options for the backround

pspmodel2001 - June 15, 2012 - LG Optimus 2X with version 1.2.1
Love it but needs one one thing
I abosolutly love this but if it had the ability to add a wallpaper for a background, i would never change backgrounds again. Ill add the 5th star when u add that ability.

EVE - May 12, 2012 - Version 1.2.1
Aqua Flows....
Much more stable. While multiple colour options exist, finding many colour options hard to like. Keeping this just for aqua combination. Hope there will separate option to choose colour of background in future...

A - May 16, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Note with version 1.2.1
Does not work on Galaxy Note
I (and I'm sure other Samsung owners) have been waiting for a fix for months. But the developer does not seem to be interested in helping people who have a purchased this wallpaper and then upgraded to a Samsung phone..

antony - May 9, 2012 - HTC Sensation 4G with version 1.2.1
Sensation Xe
Back to 5* as now works with 4.0

Edgar - June 8, 2012 - Samsung Nexus S with version 1.2.1
Yay!
Works on ICS now! :D

Kenneth - May 6, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.2.1
Finally
4.0 support..5 star now

Steven - May 31, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Note with version 1.2.1
Works great on my Galaxy Note
Work with no problems on my Galaxy Note (i717) with Ice Cream Sandwich Alpha 2.

Mikey - May 6, 2012 - EeePad Transformer TF101 with version 1.2.1
Tablet
Love it works great on my transformer 101

Domo - June 14, 2012 - Version 1.2.1
More
Really good i would just like to be able to choose more colors

June 12, 2012 - HTC Evo 4G with version 1.2.1
Good
Many colors!!!!

Jan - November 9, 2011 - Motorola Photon 4G with version 1.2.0
So relaxing; nice customizations.
Watching this reminds me of snorkeling w/tropical fish, also of watching a lava lamp. Would like to block certain colors on random. Mtrla Photon.

Cody - January 3, 2012 - Version 1.2.0
My go-to lwp
Great stuff. Loving the random colors set to 60 seconds. Really great looking yet subtle.

Valorie - February 28, 2011 - Version 1.2.0
Love that I can tweak it "my" way. Very fluid in movement . Very ...
Love that I can tweak it "my" way. Very fluid in movement . Very vibrant colors. Works great on the Fascinate.

Vico - October 14, 2011 - SEMC Xperia Mini Pro with version 1.2.0
Hi
Nice. Some blue colors show as white. Vertical does not work. Not much diff w/ lite version. But since I appreciate the quality, I do not askforrefund

Hayden - February 22, 2011 - Version 1.2.0
Looks great could run smoother, developer added the features I really wanted - so ...
Looks great could run smoother, developer added the features I really wanted - so great support too.

Brian - December 17, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 1.2.0
Epic 4g Touch support?
Loved this live wallpaper on my Moment and Epic 4g, but on my Epic 4g Touch (a Samsung Galaxy II phone) all I get is a blank white screen. Please fix!

Jeff - May 15, 2011 - LG Optimus One with version 1.2.0
Totally worth buying. One of the top 3 LW I've ever seen. It does ...
Totally worth buying. One of the top 3 LW I've ever seen. It does freeze from time to time. That needs to be fixed.

Jakob - February 4, 2011 - Version 1.2.0
Easily best wallpaper especially since update for black layer. Works great on ...
Easily best wallpaper especially since update for black layer. Works great on desire HD

BiggDaddy - December 29, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 1.2.0
Absolute Bull S*#T
Does not work on galaxy s2. This was my absolute fav live wlpr on my evo. Sent numerous emails to developer & not even 1 reply. DO NOT BUY IF U HAVE A GALAXY S2.

Aidan - January 19, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.2.0
Fix it!
Seriously, it won't work on Galaxy Nexus (or ics) so fix it asap!

donte - September 8, 2011 - Version 1.2.0
Needs work
It is ok because it does not freeze up the phone and works pretty well but i would like to see some hd and 3d features in the future

Drew - October 22, 2011 - Motorola Droid 3 with version 1.2.0
Cool wave
Would be 5 stars if you could add your own photo to the background

MMG - January 26, 2012 - Samsung Nexus S with version 1.2.0
Fail on ICS
Got a Nexus S which had this wallpaper work fine before update to ICS. Once I updated though, it crashed all the time. I emailed the developer to try and give him a chance to fix it, but no reply or update since MID DECEMBER! Do not waste your money, it will crash and the developer obviously doesn't care enough to fix it

Christopher - August 11, 2011 - HTC G2 with version 1.2.0
Absolute love.
best live wallpaper on any stock phone and market! I just wish you had more background textures to choose from! Still 5 stars though!

Daniel - July 20, 2011 - Motorola Defy with version 1.2.0
Very nice, could you make a dark green version? Thx.

David - February 9, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 1.2.0
Wow! Love this LWP. Flows elegantly across my screen like a ribbon of silk. ...
Wow! Love this LWP. Flows elegantly across my screen like a ribbon of silk. HTC Desire 2.2

Joey - June 1, 2011 - HTC Evo 4G with version 1.2.0
I love it! Great graphics, no lag and low battery drain. Worth more than ...
I love it! Great graphics, no lag and low battery drain. Worth more than $.99

Nathan Keller - July 12, 2011 - HTC EVO 3D with version 1.2.0
Love the app, but maybe add a constant changing mode, where it would cycle ...
Love the app, but maybe add a constant changing mode, where it would cycle through the rainbow, similar to LED color changers?

Sara - April 10, 2011 - Motorola Droid X with version 1.2.0
Needs more color customization! Dark brown gradient background with aqua wave ...
Needs more color customization! Dark brown gradient background with aqua wave would be amazing and worth 5 stars!

Kevin - August 21, 2011 - HTC EVO Shift 4G with version 1.2.0
Clean and Class. Not tacky like most live wlpprs
Finally, a non-stock live wallpaper that doesn't look like it was made by a three year old. So many options to customize to suit your taste if you want a less is more clean looking live wallpaper. Great job!

Andrew - May 6, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.2.0
:(
Does not work on galaxy nexus

Kenell - January 6, 2012 - Motorola Droid X with version 1.2.0
Nice.
It's very nice but needs the glitter in the background thy ia currently on the ps3

christopher - February 16, 2011 - HTC Desire HD with version 1.2.0
Work smooth but lack luster
I don't expect it to be just like the PS3. but the ap is just a scrolling waved line . It works smooth but it's verry lackluster compared to the pictures. Textures are cool, but don't expect random waves like the PS3. However it does run verry smoothly with minnimal leaching.

March 18, 2011 - Version 1.2.0
Looks pretty good, it seems to be consuming battery quite fast though in my ...
Looks pretty good, it seems to be consuming battery quite fast though in my opinion which is contrary to what others say.

Suds - March 31, 2011 - Version 1.2.0
Alan, don't be an idiot. Think before you complain. It's not supposed to open; ...
Alan, don't be an idiot. Think before you complain. It's not supposed to open; it's a wallpaper, not an application. It's a damned good one too.

Aaman - February 10, 2011 - HTC Desire HD with version 1.2.0
Slows down phone desire hd otherwise 5 stars if didn't slow phone down great ...
Slows down phone desire hd otherwise 5 stars if didn't slow phone down great slick graphics.... please fix the problem

Kelley - December 17, 2011 - Version 1.2.0
GS2
Does not work with the Galaxy S2 please update.

Dr. Swelby - October 11, 2011 - HTC Incredible 2 with version 1.2.0
Good
Good. Like it a lot. Needs size change on the wave, or wave variations.

Damian - May 3, 2011 - Motorola Droid with version 1.2.0
Looks great! Custom colours and background images would also be good options to ...
Looks great! Custom colours and background images would also be good options to have in future builds.

ultragirl - July 15, 2011 - Motorola Droid II with version 1.2.0
Got full, obviously, to have diff colors. This will be great wallpaper if you ...
Got full, obviously, to have diff colors. This will be great wallpaper if you want cool but not too busy. Very nice :-)

MrZackarius - June 28, 2011 - LG Optimus One with version 1.2.0
I love it I just wish it had more colors

Phil - June 10, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 1.2.0
Galaxy S2 failure.
Such a pity that it doesn't wrk with the galaxy S2 in this version. Ignore the 'this app is compatible with your Galaxy S2' message on the Market. It just results in a White screen.

Beodd - February 6, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 1.2.0
Simple, clean and beautiful. Worth the buck without a doubt.

Joel - August 9, 2011 - HTC EVO Shift 4G with version 1.2.0
I have not have had a problem as of yet, no freezing or any ...
I have not have had a problem as of yet, no freezing or any thing for the past 3 days, i would like to see dark green and partical effects, EVO Shift

AI - February 10, 2012 - HTC Sensation 4G with version 1.2.0
No ICS support
Sadly after updating to ICS it no longer works on any of my ICS devices. (touchpad, Sensation, SGS2, Desire)

Installed fine but won't open!

Only one
Won't use anything else

looks nice but...

Love the look but sadly.crashes constantly on HTC thunderbolt, look forward to ...
Love the look but sadly.crashes constantly on HTC thunderbolt, look forward to updates. Once it rodents crash so much would give 5stars

Still freezes on the G2. I was hoping the update would have alleviated this ...

Alex - January 25, 2012 - HTC Desire S with version 1.2.0
Great
Could do with a few more colours but great background

Shaun - June 9, 2011 - Version 1.2.0
Probably the best live wallpaper there is, great on the Xperia x10, but I ...
Probably the best live wallpaper there is, great on the Xperia x10, but I had to give it just 3, as you get nothing but white on the Galaxy S2.

Jaaved - February 23, 2012 - HTC Desire HD with version 1.2.0
Great find
This is by far the best live wallpaper. Its simple ,smooth ,doesn't lag at all and of course its looks just like the ps wave.

hasatan - November 1, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 1.2.0
The PSP
Wallpaper rules. I bought this because I was incredibly impressed with the free app. Thank you for giving me a soothing wallpaper. :)

Al - September 27, 2011 - HTC Sensation 4G with version 1.2.0
Great and classy!
As simple as you want it. Doesn't seem to hurt battery. Worth the price for full

Unsure if the new update or my new rom fixed the freezing issue but now it is working beautifully! G2 on CM 7 final

One of my favorites. Really nice. 0 lag and good graphics.

Anthony - March 2, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 1.2.0

Love the app its looks awesome. Freezes here and there on my G2. When ...
Love the app its looks awesome. Freezes here and there on my G2. When working flows perfectly.

Superb

The wallpaper looks pretty good. I would love to see an option to choose ...
